quoted.text: The EU imposes impossible rules so it can punish tech firms that refuse to silently censor free speech. We saw the same in France: a baseless ‚Äúcriminal investigation‚Äù, then intelligence services offering to help with it if @telegram quietly censored speech in Romania and Moldova.

The USA should sanction the EU immediately.

Any country that violates our human right to free speech or imposes penalties to US companies exercising this right should feel the immediate wrath by the full power of the US government.

Without free speech, we have nothing.
